name: d3-parallel-links
description: Enables multiple parallel links between two nodes in d3.js graphs
author: Ram Tobolski

scripts.pretest: rimraf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-parallel-links.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-parallel-links.js -c -m -o build/d3-parallel-links.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-parallel-links.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-parallel-links.js build/d3-parallel-links.min.js
